column4: So I just installed Ubuntu with the manual parition option, but it whiped windows out ...lol was that supposed to happen?
I wrote the partition table on free space of /dev/hda but it named /dev/hda1  as one of the partitions and thats the same name it gave windows b4 i clicked ...
soreau:do you know what i did wrong?
you selected the whole drive instead of the empty/free partition
